data.text: ――An ancient philosopher once said:
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>――An ancient philosopher once said:

data.text: "To gain joy through incidents arousing pity and fear; That purification of emotion, is catharsis." In other words――
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: "To gain joy through incidents arousing pity and fear; That purification of emotion, is catharsis." In other words――

data.text: "Moe" is the purification of my very soul!!! The love and awe I offer my faves illuminate my soul like a ray of hope――!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: "Moe" is the purification of my very soul!!! The love and awe I offer my faves illuminate my soul like a ray of hope――!

data.text: ――Oh. Just a dream, huh...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>――Oh. Just a dream, huh...

data.text:
(My name is Agnes Digital. Just a normal, garden-variety 
Umamusume.)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>(My name is Agnes Digital. Just a normal, garden-variety 
<story>Umamusume.)

data.text:
(Today, like always, I take in the air through an invisible filter. 
After all, I'm at――)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>(Today, like always, I take in the air through an invisible filter. 
<story>After all, I'm at――)

data.text: (A place so full of my faves that I wouldn't even dare breathe the same air―― Tracen Academy! Something's bound to happen in an Umamusume-chan paradise like this...!)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: (A place so full of my faves that I wouldn't even dare breathe the same air―― Tracen Academy! Something's bound to happen in an Umamusume-chan paradise like this...!)

data.text:
Now hang on, you, just how long are you going to keep following 
me?!
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet
data.processed:
<story>Now hang on, you, just how long are you going to keep following 
<story>me?!

data.text: I'm not, dang it! I'm going to the track too! I'm the one who oughtta tell you to stop following me!
data.name: Vodka
data.processed: I'm not, dang it! I'm going to the track too! I'm the one who oughtta tell you to stop following me!

data.text:
(Ehhhh!? They're pretending to argue, just to have an excuse to 
stop and talk to each other!? Right...!?)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>(Ehhhh!? They're pretending to argue, just to have an excuse to 
<story>stop and talk to each other!? Right...!?)

data.text: (Even though they could've run off without a word?! What is going on here?! What sort of feelings are driving them?!)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: (Even though they could've run off without a word?! What is going on here?! What sort of feelings are driving them?!)

data.text: (It's got to be... feelings... for each other...!!!?)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: (It's got to be... feelings... for each other...!!!?)

data.text: (Ha~~~ I t ' s t o o G O O D ! ! ! ! !)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: (Ha~~~ I t ' s t o o G O O D ! ! ! ! !)

data.text:
(――That's right, I enrolled just to see my faves up close!! 
I stand here, now, for the sake of experiencing those "Best Fave 
Moments"!!)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>(――That's right, I enrolled just to see my faves up close!! 
<story>I stand here, now, for the sake of experiencing those "Best Fave 
<story>Moments"!!)

data.text: (As always, Tracen Academy... IS THE BEEEEEEEEST!!!!)
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: (As always, Tracen Academy... IS THE BEEEEEEEEST!!!!)

data.text:
Good work again today, Trainer-san. 
Are you settled in to the academy already?
data.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
data.processed:
<story>Good work again today, Trainer-san. 
<story>Are you settled in to the academy already?

data.text:
There's quite a variety of talented Umamusume enrolled here. 
I encourage you to find someone you'd like to train with ♪
data.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
data.processed:
<story>There's quite a variety of talented Umamusume enrolled here. 
<story>I encourage you to find someone you'd like to train with ♪

data.text:
――Tracen Academy. The institution dedicated to training the 
Umamusume who race in the Twinkle Series.
data.processed:
<story>――Tracen Academy. The institution dedicated to training the 
<story>Umamusume who race in the Twinkle Series.

data.text:
I worked really hard and finally managed to become a trainer at 
the Academy. I may be inexperienced, but I'd like to think my 
passion makes up for it.

choices.text: (Time to give it my all today, too!)
(Time to give it my all today, too!)

data.processed:
<story>I worked really hard and finally managed to become a trainer at 
<story>the Academy. I may be inexperienced, but I'd like to think my 
<story>passion makes up for it.

data.text:
I psyched myself up and went down to observe the running 
Umamusume. Seeing them giving it their all, I couldn't help but 
raise my fist and cheer.
data.processed:
<story>I psyched myself up and went down to observe the running 
<story>Umamusume. Seeing them giving it their all, I couldn't help but 
<story>raise my fist and cheer.

data.text:
Ghh... She really gets on my nerves...! 
Always butting into my space――
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet
data.processed:
<story>Ghh... She really gets on my nerves...! 
<story>Always butting into my space――

data.text: No way am I going to lose to her!!
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet
data.processed: No way am I going to lose to her!!

data.text:
Yes――! You may stand among the great and powerful! 
But you are undeniably a goddess in your own right!!
data.processed:
<story>Yes――! You may stand among the great and powerful! 
<story>But you are undeniably a goddess in your own right!!

data.text: I exist to kneel before thy brilliance!
data.processed: <story>I exist to kneel before thy brilliance!

data.text:
Rightgeousness! Pweciousness! 
You're our holy goddeeeeess~~~~~~!!!!
data.processed:
<story>Rightgeousness! Pweciousness! 
<story>You're our holy goddeeeeess~~~~~~!!!!

data.text:
With our cheers behind her, she pushed through the final straight 
at incredible speed...!!
data.processed:
<story>With our cheers behind her, she pushed through the final straight 
<story>at incredible speed...!!

data.text:
Feeling pretty pleased with things, I took a curious glance beside 
me――
data.processed:
<story>Feeling pretty pleased with things, I took a curious glance beside 
<story>me――

data.text: Wheeze... wheeze... huff.... huff....
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Wheeze... wheeze... huff.... huff....

data.text:
She felt the threat of her pursuers, but turned that fear into her 
power. Power enough to push through those last three 
furlongs...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>She felt the threat of her pursuers, but turned that fear into her 
<story>power. Power enough to push through those last three 
<story>furlongs...

data.text:
And the moment she crossed the finish line, oh, she just couldn't 
help but smile! Ahhh, that blessed smile is our divine reward! 
Don't you agree!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>And the moment she crossed the finish line, oh, she just couldn't 
<story>help but smile! Ahhh, that blessed smile is our divine reward! 
<story>Don't you agree!?

data.text: What?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>What?

data.text: Ah. Sorry. My inner asuras were going wild... Umamusume-chans are the best, amirite? Hehehhe...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Ah. Sorry. My inner asuras were going wild... Umamusume-chans are the best, amirite? Hehehhe...

data.text: I could feel it, you know. You, too, infuse your cheers with a passionate karma. As a fellow traveler on this karmic path, I can't afford to fall behind...
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: I could feel it, you know. You, too, infuse your cheers with a passionate karma. As a fellow traveler on this karmic path, I can't afford to fall behind...

data.text:
I kind of got caught up in the flow there, but I wonder what she's 
up to. Wait, is she not going to run too?

choices.text: Sorry, do you have a second?

data.processed:
<story>I kind of got caught up in the flow there, but I wonder what she's 
<story>up to. Wait, is she not going to run too?

data.text: Wh- There's no way. ...Wait, now they're running together!? But didn't you just say "she really gets on my nerves"...!!!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Wh- There's no way. ...Wait, now they're running together!? But didn't you just say "she really gets on my nerves"...!!!?

data.text: Wait, then, you mean, she was hiding how she really felt!? WHAAA~! My oh my, what forbidden fruit!! Le mariage of sweet and bitter―
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Wait, then, you mean, she was hiding how she really felt!? WHAAA~! My oh my, what forbidden fruit!! Le mariage of sweet and bitter―

data.text: ――Oh. Yeah!? What's up...!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>――Oh. Yeah!? What's up...!?

data.text:
Oh, was I being too loud...? 
Would you accept an Umamusume-chan anecdote as an apology?
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: Are you not going to run?
Are you not going to run?

data.processed:
<story>Oh, was I being too loud...? 
<story>Would you accept an Umamusume-chan anecdote as an apology?

data.text: ...Hwuh? Me?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>...Hwuh? Me?

data.text: Whaaat? Nonono!! You just got to see those precious Umamusume-chan run, and you're going to say something like that!?
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Whaaat? Nonono!! You just got to see those precious Umamusume-chan run, and you're going to say something like that!?

data.text:
Nope, nope, that's no good! No running from me! 
None! None! Absolutely none!
data.name: Agnes Digital

choices.text: But aren't you a student here?

data.processed:
<story>Nope, nope, that's no good! No running from me! 
<story>None! None! Absolutely none!

data.text: Look, I know, but I won't do it!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: <story>Look, I know, but I won't do it!

data.text:
It'd be like the fall of the Tower of Babel! The final Armageddon! 
If I go out there without steeling myself it'll turn out all 
wishy-was―― Never mind! Anyway!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed:
<story>It'd be like the fall of the Tower of Babel! The final Armageddon! 
<story>If I go out there without steeling myself it'll turn out all 
<story>wishy-was―― Never mind! Anyway!

data.text: Saying you want to see me run after getting to see those unbearably precious Umamusume-chans run is like saving room for natto after dessert!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: Saying you want to see me run after getting to see those unbearably precious Umamusume-chans run is like saving room for natto after dessert!

data.text: 100% would not recommend! Now then. See you later, Umamusume-chan-loving Trainer!
data.name: Agnes Digital
data.processed: 100% would not recommend! Now then. See you later, Umamusume-chan-loving Trainer!

data.text: ...And there she goes.
data.processed: <story>...And there she goes.

data.text:
There's something off about her. 
I'm a little curious how on earth it'd turn out if she really did run.
data.processed:
<story>There's something off about her. 
<story>I'm a little curious how on earth it'd turn out if she really did run.
